001package org.biopax.paxtools.impl.level3;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.NucleicAcidReference;
004import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.NucleicAcidRegionReference;
005import org.biopax.paxtools.util.BPCollections;
006
007import java.util.Set;
008
009public abstract class NucleicAcidReferenceImpl extends SequenceEntityReferenceImpl implements NucleicAcidReference
010{
011        private Set<NucleicAcidRegionReference> subRegion;
012
013        public NucleicAcidReferenceImpl()
014        {
015                this.subRegion = BPCollections.I.createSafeSet();
016        }
017
018        public Set<NucleicAcidRegionReference> getSubRegion()
019        {
020                return subRegion;
021        }
022
023        public void addSubRegion(NucleicAcidRegionReference regionReference)
024        {
025                if (regionReference != null)
026                {
027                        subRegion.add(regionReference);
028                        regionReference.getSubRegionOf().add(this);
029                }
030        }
031
032        public void removeSubRegion(NucleicAcidRegionReference regionReference)
033        {
034                if (regionReference != null)
035                {
036                        subRegion.remove(regionReference);
037                }
038        }
039}
040
